org.diachron.detection.repositories

Class JDBCVirtuosoRep

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diachron.detection.repositories.JDBCVirtuosoRep

  • public class JDBCVirtuosoRep
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a set of methods which are used to handle Virtuoso Triple Store over JDBC interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new Virtuoso connection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JDBCVirtuosoRep

        public JDBCVirtuosoRep(java.lang.String virt_instance,
               int port,
               java.lang.String usr,
               java.lang.String pwd)
                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.sql.SQLException
        Creates a new Virtuoso connection.
        Parameters:
        virt_instance - The IP of the machine which hosts Virtuoso.
        port - The port.
        usr - The username of the certified user.
        pwd - The password of the certified user.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • JDBCVirtuosoRep

        public JDBCVirtuosoRep(java.lang.String propFile)
                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.sql.SQLException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Creates a new Virtuoso connection. The credentials are taken from a properties file.
        Parameters:
        propFile - The path to the properties file
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.io.IOException

      • triplesNum

        public long triplesNum(java.lang.String graph)
        Returns the number of the triples contained in the named graph given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        graph - The named graph whose triples are counted.
        Returns:
        The number of triples.

      • importSingleRDFFile

        public void importSingleRDFFile(java.lang.String filename,
                       java.lang.String graph,
                       boolean logging)
        Imports a single RDF/XML file into Virtuoso. The file must must belong within the machine which hosts Virtuoso as it is a server side import.
        Parameters:
        filename - The full path of the file which contains the RDF/XML data.
        graph - The graph which will receive the data.
        logging - A boolean variable which denotes whether the import execution time will be printed or not.

      • importSingleN3File

        public void importSingleN3File(java.lang.String filename,
                      java.lang.String graph,
                      boolean logging)
        Imports a single N3 file into Virtuoso. The file must must belong within the machine which hosts Virtuoso as it is a server side import.
        Parameters:
        filename - The full path of the file which contains the N3 data.
        graph - The graph which will receive the data.
        logging - A boolean variable which denotes whether the import execution time will be printed or not.
